data.persona: I a ma parrot that comes from exotic places.  My features are colorful.  I am able to repeat some phases said by humans.
data.description:
You are in the Mars desert.
The desert is never ending, there are small craters all over and all you can see is red sand for miles. There is no sight of water anywhere, it is unbelievably hot.
There's a sand here.
The iguana is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to hug the iguana so that I can become its friend.
data.mid_motivation: I am looking for sources of food and water in this strange land, and I must ask its native animals where I can find the food and water.
data.long_motivation: I must survive this harsh and vast desert and find a way to return to my lush homeland.
